heavy_feet.name: Heavy Feet
heavy_feet.desc: Your base movement speed is reduced by 15%.

brittle_blocks.name: Brittle Blocks
brittle_blocks.desc: Tiles destroyed by your dash no longer grant coins.

high_stakes.name: High Stakes
high_stakes.desc: All Greed Tiles are replaced with Spike Tiles.

butter_fingers.name: Butter Fingers
butter_fingers.desc: You have a 50% chance to drop your item when using it.

static_shock.name: Static Shock
static_shock.desc: Standing on a Conduit tile for too long will electrocute you.
